about_the_game:
DLC "Oort Cloud' Master" for MMOG "Astro Lords"

Get upgrades for your exploration in the Oort Cloud with the new Cloud Voyager proposal
This package will assist you in research and military operations in the Oort Cloud.

The package includes officers that increase the number of missions, the speed of missions, the chance of destroying the enemy's starbase cannon. They can be applied not only to the captains, but also to the starbase.

DLC "Cloud Voyage" includes:

Officers:
  • "Anfisa Alaeva" Silver Mission limit +3
    "German Lanovoy" Silver Speed ​​of all missions outside the radius of the radar (Except pirate raid) from an asteroid where an officer is hired + 15%
    "Valery Fezler" Silver Chance of destroying enemy Starbase cannon + 20%

Contracts:
  • 3 "Contracts" for 1 month[/]

    How to use the DLC:
    • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
    • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, select it and press the button: Collect the reward
    • Enjoy your DLC!

    Attention, important!

    In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.
detailed_description:
A CINEMATIC SPACE SHOOTER - WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game

DLC "Oort Cloud' Master" for MMOG "Astro Lords"

Get upgrades for your exploration in the Oort Cloud with the new Cloud Voyager proposal
This package will assist you in research and military operations in the Oort Cloud.

The package includes officers that increase the number of missions, the speed of missions, the chance of destroying the enemy's starbase cannon. They can be applied not only to the captains, but also to the starbase.

DLC "Cloud Voyage" includes:

Officers:
  • "Anfisa Alaeva" Silver Mission limit +3
    "German Lanovoy" Silver Speed ​​of all missions outside the radius of the radar (Except pirate raid) from an asteroid where an officer is hired + 15%
    "Valery Fezler" Silver Chance of destroying enemy Starbase cannon + 20%

Contracts:
  • 3 "Contracts" for 1 month[/]

    How to use the DLC:
    • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
    • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, select it and press the button: Collect the reward
    • Enjoy your DLC!

    Attention, important!

    In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 или ATI Radeon x1950 256 Мб
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 или ATI Radeon x1950 256 Мб
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
